items.sentence: Perhaps you've misunderstood the aim of our project.
How many gas stations do you think are in this city?
People seem more serious nowadays than they used to.
There are plenty of weirdos living in this building.
I doubt Tom can play the violin as well as Mary can.
I think there's a possibility that Tom will do that.
The company Tom was working for declared bankruptcy.
The telephone is something that we can't do without.
It's cloudy, I'm afraid, so you can't see any stars.
We've been waiting for you for ages. Where were you?
